title: How to Make a Kit Kat Milkshake

steps.headline: Pour the ice cream or yogurt and milk into a blender.
steps.description: Blend on high speed for about one minute, until well-combined.

steps.headline: Add in the vanilla extract and Kit-Kat.
steps.description: Blend on medium speed for about two minutes.

steps.headline: Pour the milkshake into four large, chilled glasses.
Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream and chocolate syrup.
Serve.
steps.description: Place a piece of Kit-Kat on top to garnish and decorate the milkshake. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Pour the ice cream or yogurt and milk into a blender.
steps.description: Blend on high speed for about one minute until well-combined.

steps.headline: Add in the vanilla extract and Kit-Kat.
steps.description: Blend on medium speed for about two minutes. Add the caramel pieces. Blend again.

steps.headline: Pour the milkshake into four large, chilled glasses.
Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream and caramel syrup.
Serve.
steps.description: Place a piece of Kit-Kat on top to garnish and decorate the milkshake. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Pour the ice cream or yogurt and milk into a blender.
steps.description: Blend on high speed for about one minute until well-combined.

steps.headline: Add in the vanilla extract and Kit-Kat.
steps.description: Blend on medium speed for about two minutes. Add the peanut butter. Blend again.

steps.headline: Pour the milkshake into four large, chilled glasses.
Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream, chocolate syrup, and nuts.
Serve.
steps.description: Place a piece of Kit-Kat on top to garnish and decorate the milkshake. Enjoy!

text: Simple Kit-Kat Milkshake Pour the ice cream or yogurt and milk into a blender. Blend on high speed for about one minute, until well-combined. Add in the vanilla extract and Kit-Kat. Blend on medium speed for about two minutes. Pour the milkshake into four large, chilled glasses.  Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream and chocolate syrup.  Serve. Place a piece of Kit-Kat on top to garnish and decorate the milkshake. Enjoy! Caramel Kit Kat Milkshake Pour the ice cream or yogurt and milk into a blender. Blend on high speed for about one minute until well-combined. Add in the vanilla extract and Kit-Kat. Blend on medium speed for about two minutes. Add the caramel pieces. Blend again. Pour the milkshake into four large, chilled glasses.  Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream and caramel syrup.  Serve. Place a piece of Kit-Kat on top to garnish and decorate the milkshake. Enjoy! Peanut Butter Kit Kat Milkshake Pour the ice cream or yogurt and milk into a blender. Blend on high speed for about one minute until well-combined. Add in the vanilla extract and Kit-Kat. Blend on medium speed for about two minutes. Add the peanut butter. Blend again. Pour the milkshake into four large, chilled glasses.  Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream, chocolate syrup, and nuts.  Serve. Place a piece of Kit-Kat on top to garnish and decorate the milkshake. Enjoy!

Blend on high speed for about one minute, until well-combined.
Add in the vanilla extract and Kit-Kat.
Blend on medium speed for about two minutes.
Pour the milkshake into four large, chilled glasses.
Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream and chocolate syrup.

Enjoy!
Caramel Kit Kat Milkshake Pour the ice cream or yogurt and milk into a blender.
Blend on high speed for about one minute until well-combined.
Add in the vanilla extract and Kit-Kat.
Blend on medium speed for about two minutes.
Add the caramel pieces.
Blend again.
Pour the milkshake into four large, chilled glasses.
Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream and caramel syrup.
Serve.
Place a piece of Kit-Kat on top to garnish and decorate the milkshake.
Enjoy!
Peanut Butter Kit Kat Milkshake Pour the ice cream or yogurt and milk into a blender.
Blend on high speed for about one minute until well-combined.
Add in the vanilla extract and Kit-Kat.
Blend on medium speed for about two minutes.
Add the peanut butter.
Blend again.
Pour the milkshake into four large, chilled glasses.
Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream, chocolate syrup, and nuts.
Serve.
Place a piece of Kit-Kat on top to garnish and decorate the milkshake.
Enjoy!
